# extended line scans not executed in 2019-2020 winter season.

frame:
 - LidarCollect --ip 192.168.4.4 --frame 1 30 130 0.04 80 280 0.04

line (called by frame, during snowfall event):
 - LidarCollect --ip 192.168.4.4 --line 1 30 130 0.04 185 120
 - LidarCollect --ip 192.168.4.4 --line 1 57 59 0.02 172.4 30 spectralon
 - LidarCollect --ip 192.168.4.4 --line 1 83 84 0.02 103.3 30 spectralon-gondola

line_extended (called every 15 min, during a snowfall event):
 - LidarCollect --ip 192.168.4.4 --line 1 30 130 0.04 185 150 extended

 Snowfall event parameters:
  - if [ $snowcount -gt 15 ] && [ $snowcount2 -gt 15 ]; then

SOP Matrix:
# Scanner to Local coordinate system transformation matrix.
-0.0423820630000000 -0.9986315820000000 0.0306386050000000 -7.6667381210000000
0.8297032050000000 -0.0522635410000000 -0.5557527450000001 4.6076375620000000
0.5565935250000001 0.0018670010000000 0.8307828610000000 2922.6963403670003000
0.0000000000000000 0.0000000000000000 0.0000000000000000 1.0000000000000000

POP Matrix:
#Local to global coordinate system transformation matrix.
0.8743740040000000 0.2963631640000000 -0.3842381770000000 -2453789.2369902502000000
